selected_quotes: @rich752913078 @rockytech @hollyhaygood @SlenderSkeptic Also, here's emperical evidence that supports that dark matter exists. Just to answer your earlier question.
@Lawrious Absolutely. Read up on this: (I think it rules out modified Netownian or GR)
@MrMusselman thank Cosmos for gravity. Here's an amazing paper on center of mass v.center of light lensing's cool too
Oddly enough, I've read plenty of later analyses, but I've never read the original Bullet Cluster paper.
Love that Clowe+ titled their Bullet Cluster paper A Direct Empirical Proof of the Existence of Dark Matter. Boo-yah.

facebook.title: Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD)
facebook.summary:
총알 은하단의 수수께끼 (2017년 1월 15일)

총알 은하단에 무슨 문제가 있나? 은하단에 의해 중력 렌징된 배경 은하들의 모습으로 추론한 결과 은하단에는 보이는 것 이외의 물질이 있는 것으로 보인다. 하지만 일각에선 중력 이론을 수정하면 또 다른 물질이 필요 없다고 주장한다. 가까운 시일 내에 새로운 관측과 컴퓨터 시뮬레이션 등의 분석을 통해 어느 주장이 맞는지 판가름 날 것이다. 붉은색은 X-레이 푸른색은 암흑물질의 예상 분포를 나타낸다.

wikipedia.title: Bullet Cluster
wikipedia.summary: The Bullet Cluster (1E 0657-558) consists of two colliding clusters of galaxies. Strictly speaking, the name Bullet Cluster refers to the smaller subcluster, moving away from the larger one.

wikipedia.title: Modified Newtonian dynamics
wikipedia.summary: In physics, modified Newtonian dynamics (MOND) is a theory that proposes a modification of Newton's laws to account for observed properties of galaxies.

wikipedia.title: Astrophysical X-ray source
wikipedia.summary: Astrophysical X-ray sources are astronomical objects with physical properties which result in the emission of X-rays.

wikipedia.title: Dark matter
wikipedia.summary: Dark matter is an unidentified type of matter distinct from dark energy, baryonic matter (ordinary matter), and neutrinos.
